module.name: Certificate Manager
module.description: Certificate Manager for Asterisk. Used for TLS, DTLS connection (think WebRTC and secure traffic)
module.changelog: *12.0.4* FREEPBX-8391 deal with race conditions. Also increase timeout *12.0.3* Update copyrights and licensing *12.0.2* FREEPBX-8090 Generate default cert at install time. *12.0.1* FREEPBX-7922 Help Text wrong for Upload Boxes *12.0.0alpha1* Inital Release
